description: Temporary helpservices for Department of National Defense (DND)
full_summary:
**National Capital Region (NCR) - Supply Arrangement for Temporary Help Services (S4528029)**
====================================================

**Tender Details**
----------------

*   **Title**: Temporary Help Services Requirement
*   **Solicitation Number**: S4528029
*   **Publication Date**: July 5, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 13, 2023, 13:00:00
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Exigence**
----------

Le Ministère de la Défense Nationale exige des services d'aide temporaire et a émis une demande de proposition à partir d'un arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement (EN578-172870).

**Requirements**
----------------

*   **Security Level**: Secret
*   **Description**: The requirement seeks temporary help services to support the Department of National Defense (DND).
*   **Pre-qualified Suppliers**: The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal: ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC, Cache Computer Consulting Corp., Cistel Technology Inc., Cofomo Ottawa, Donna Cona Inc., eVision Inc., SoftSim Technologies Inc. in Joint Venture, Excel Human Resources Inc., IBISKA Telecom Inc., MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc., NATTIQ INC., Olav Consulting Corp, Promaxis Systems Inc, Protak Consulting Group Inc., Quallium Corporation, SYSTEMATIX SOLUTIONS TI INC/SYSTEMATIX IT SOLUTIONS INC.

**Key Information**
------------------

*   **Contact**: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
*   **Email**: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (613) 971-7955
*   **Bid Document**: The bid document is available on the Canada Buy Service website at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This RFP is open to qualified suppliers participating in the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

*   National Capital Region (NCR)

Note: The contractor shared that the tender is already expired, but you see if you could keep the original details
